name: 4420courts-monorepo
description: 4420 Courts customer site and dealer portal monorepo

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:customer
scripts.install:all: cd apps/customer-site && npm ci && cd ../dealer-portal && npm ci
scripts.lint: cd apps/customer-site && npm run lint && cd ../dealer-portal && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: cd apps/customer-site && npm run type-check && cd ../dealer-portal && npm run type-check
scripts.test: cd apps/customer-site && npm test && cd ../dealer-portal && npm test
scripts.db:reset: prisma db push --force-reset && npm run db:seed
